body_html:
From the contents of .tf_configure.bazelrc posted above, I see you answered nccl 1 in ./configure

NCCL2 will work, just download the os/agnostic package from: https://developer.nvidia.com/nccl/nccl-download and extract the file and use .configure to point at the directory containing the include and lib (or lib64) directory.
